title: Is anyone else super pumped for Yasuo to have 0% crit rate after IE
body: Good riddance {{champion:157}}. You wont be missed.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Moonfall Saber,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Efb9JgoI,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-05-08T01:32:00.588+0000)
>
> Good riddance {{champion:157}}. You wont be missed.

hes getting reworked im sure theyre working him around that
They should rework him into a dumpster{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

> [{quoted}](name=Moonfall Saber,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Efb9JgoI,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-05-08T02:10:16.206+0000)
>
> They should rework him into a dumpster{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

fr lol  or use this opportunity to just delete him
Any good Yasuo builds a zeal item before IE, though..

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Efb9JgoI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-08T01:33:06.210+0000)
>
> Any good Yasuo builds a zeal item before IE, though..

And on top of that Yasuo’s crit will be quadrupled with IE. So he will get 100% crit even faster...

EDIT: NVM I was being stupid when I typed that. But that 20% true damage conversion will really hurt for a nasus player like me
No, he wont. He will get to 100% exactly when he does now.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Efb9JgoI,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2018-05-08T01:47:12.085+0000)
>
> No, he wont. He will get to 100% exactly when he does now.

Yeah I realized that when I was typing that comment. But eh

> [{quoted}](name=Doge2020,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Efb9JgoI,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-08T01:35:01.363+0000)
>
> And on top of that Yasuo’s crit will be quadrupled with IE. So he will get 100% crit even faster...

no he wont.

currently, a zeal item + i.e. gives 50% crit chance, which means he hits 100% with those two items.

after the rework, its literally the same except that both items are more expensive.

dont all of them rush pd anyways? i havent seen a yasuo build i.e. first in ages.

so there isnt really changing anything about his build path. the only notable thing is the cost increase on the zeal items.
